artist: After Francesco Mazzola (Il Parmigianino); Francesco Rosaspina
description: Virgin seated holding child; St. Margaret seated at her feet embracing child; an angel behind Virgin; St. Jerome at right holding crucifix; St. Augustine seated at left

title: The Blessed Virgin with Child Jesus, an Angel, St. Margaret. St. Jerome and St. Augustine
